name: Beppo's Hole in One Golf
description:
Beppo's Hole in One Golf is a 2d top down golf game featuring exciting golf game play and a challenging 9 holes of golf. 

100% of the profit from "pay what you want" will be donated to the Canadian Cancer Society (http://www.cancer.ca/).

Beginners and Pros alike can find fun and challenge with Beppo's Hole in One Golf.

  • Features all the pitfalls you're used to including Water Hazard, Bunkers, Rough, and Out of Bounds areas
  • Play it safe or use the Danger Zone™ to get more power with a risky follow through swing and go for the expert shot
  • For additional challenge, choose your wind and break settings, or play on Super Expert Pro™ mode
  • Share your scores with friends using the "save score" feature

Controls

  • Just use the mouse, and click the interface to play
  • Alternatively, use the cursor keys and space bar to complete your shots
